class='brown_comment' id='comments_form_review_108852877' style='display: none'>\n<textarea class='placeholder_text' onclick=\"expand_comment_form_for('review', 108852877, true, '')\">Write a comment...</textarea>\n</div>\n\n  </td>\n</tr>\n\n      </div>\n\n  </div>\n\n  <div class=\"clear\"></div>\n</div>\n\n    </div>\n  </div>\n    <div class=\"elementListBrownSeparator\"></div>\n\n\n\n  <div class=\"friendReviews elementListBrown\" >\n    <div class=\"section\">\n      \n\n<div id=\"review_463025464\" class=\"review\" itemprop=\"reviews\" itemscope itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Review\">\n  <link itemprop=\"url\" href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/review/show/463025464\" />\n    <a title=\"Khanh (the Grinch)\" class=\"left imgcol\" href=\"/user/show/4527753-khanh-the-grinch\"><img alt=\"Khanh (the Grinch)\" src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/users/1414813051p2/4527753.jpg\" /></a>\n\n  <div class=\"left bodycol\">\n    <div class=\"reviewHeader uitext stacked\">\n        <a class=\"reviewDate createdAt right\" itemprop=\"publishDate\" href=\"/review/show/463025464?book_show_action=false\">Feb 19, 2016</a>\n\n      <a title=\"Khanh (the Grinch)\" class=\"user\" name=\"Khanh (the Grinch)\" href=\"/user/show/4527753-khanh-the-grinch\">Khanh (the Grinch)</a>\n\n        rated it\n        <span class=\" staticStars\"><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\">it was amazing</span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span></span>\n\n\n\n        \n\n\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer463025464\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer15857955024474962418\"><img src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/hostedimages/1413778808ra/11561929.gif\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br>I last read this book when I was 14 years old, given that I'm almost 32 now, I have a whole new perspective on it. Despite the fact that I gave this book 5 stars previously, I have to admit that it didn't grow on me until this, my second read. <br><br>Confession time: I didn't like Remus or Sirius.<br><br>*Khanh ducks as rotten fruit and eggs are thrown her way*<br><br>OK, OK, I'M SORRY! I've since changed my mind! Notice that I used the past tense.<br><br>Obviously, there will be <b>spoilers</b> for the book below, for the 1.5 of yo</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText15857955024474962418\" style=\"display:none\"><img src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/hostedimages/1413778808ra/11561929.gif\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br>I last read this book when I was 14 years old, given that I'm almost 32 now, I have a whole new perspective on it. Despite the fact that I gave this book 5 stars previously, I have to admit that it didn't grow on me until this, my second read. <br><br>Confession time: I didn't like Remus or Sirius.<br><br>*Khanh ducks as rotten fruit and eggs are thrown her way*<br><br>OK, OK, I'M SORRY! I've since changed my mind! Notice that I used the past tense.<br><br>Obviously, there will be <b>spoilers</b> for the book below, for the 1.5 of you who haven't read this yet.<br><br>I can't even recall why this book wasn't memorable to me. All I remembered was that Sirius - and what happened to him - was terrible, but he's like meh to me; I just never connected with him as a character. Remus was a werewolf and I've never liked werewolves. The Marauders in general were just a bunch of rowdy teenaged boys, and having been the target for teasing from rowdy, rude teenaged boys in my youth, I just didn't care for the way they were portrayed. And I was right, somewhat, James, et al weren't perfect. They bullied Snape, they were little shitheads. <br><br>Yes, eventually they became productive, admirable members of society, but I just didn't like them at first.<br><br>I guess this is one of those books that just takes time to grow on you.<br><br>This is the last Harry Potter book in which Harry is a child. Before his life - and this series - was visited by the spectre of death. I'm not talking about the long-ago deaths of James and Lily, of course Harry has experienced deaths before, but it was distant. I'm talking about the future deaths where Harry lost people he actually remembered, and respected, and loved. That's what I mean when I say that this is the last book in which Harry is a child, because as hard as his life was until now, he still had his innocence.<br><br>Children believe that their heroes are unerring. One of the rites of passage to adulthood is the realization that heroes fall, like everyone else.<blockquote>\n  <i>Harry stared up into the grave face and felt as though the ground beneath him was falling sharply away. He had grown used to the idea that Dumbledore could solve anything. He had expected Dumbledore to pull some amazing solution out of the air. But no U+2026 their last hope was gone.</i>\n</blockquote>I know that everyone loves Sirius, but for some reason, he didn't click for me when I was 14. This time around, I could understand his character more. I could relate to his desperation, his frustration, and the hope that kept him alive all those excruciating years in Azkaban.<blockquote>\n  <i>U+2018I donU+2019t know how I did it,U+2019 he said slowly. U+2018I think the only reason I never lost my mind is that I knew I was innocent. That wasnU+2019t a happy thought, so the Dementors couldnU+2019t suck it out of me U+2026 but it kept me sane.</i>\n</blockquote>I think for me, it took maturity and the experience of loss and frustration, well, life itself, in order to appreciate the hardship that Harry and Sirius and Remus went through. <br><br>Previously, this was a magical Cinderella-like tale about a boy in a room under the stairs. With this book, the story became twisted, and it became something more.<br><br>Read this review and more @ <a href=\"http://thebookeaters.net\" rel=\"nofollow\">The Book Eaters</a></span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"15857955024474962418\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n      <div class=\"reviewFooter uitext buttons\">\n          \n\n<tr class=\"no_border feedFooterReview\" id=\"update_comment_stuff_Review463025464\">\n  <td colspan=\"2\">\n    <div class=\"updateActionLinks\">\n        <a class=\"right flag\" rel=\"nofollow\" id=\"flag_link463025464\" title=\"Flag this review as inappropriate.\" href=\"/flagged/new?resource_id=463025464&resource_type=Review&return_url=/book/show/5.Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban\">flag</a>\n\n\n\n\n\n      <span class='likeItContainer' id='like_container_review_463025464'><a id=\"like_count_review_463025464\" rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"/rating/voters/463025464?resource_type=Review\"><span class=\"likesCount\">424 likes</span></a>U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0<span class=\"loadingLinkSpan\"><a id=\"like_action_review_463025464\" rel=\"nofollow\" data-like-container-id=\"like_container_review_463025464\" ref=\"like\" class=\"jsLike like_it gr-button gr-button--small loadingLink\" data-remote=\"true\" data-method=\"post\" href=\"/rating?count_on_right=false&format=json&lc=424&rating[page]=1&rating[rating]=1&rating[resource_id]=463025464&rating[resource_type]=Review\">Like</a><span class=\"loadingAnimation\"></span><span class=\"loadingError\"></span></span></span>\nU+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0<a id=\"commentLink_463025464\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"comment_form_for('review', 463025464, true, ''); I feel like he's like an alternative Harry. How Harry most likely would have been had his life not</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText12822869424761321155\" style=\"display:none\">I did like the idea of James Potter as a character. I feel like he's like an alternative Harry. How Harry most likely would have been had his life not been marred with tragedy. I think thats why Rowling madeJames like that. The Dark Arts teacher who is just a teacher.</span>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n      <div class=\"reviewFooter uitext buttons\">\n          \n\n<tr class=\"no_border feedFooterReview\" id=\"update_comment_stuff_Review986954965\">\n  <td colspan=\"2\">\n    <div class=\"updateActionLinks\">\n        <a class=\"right flag\" rel=\"nofollow\" id=\"flag_link986954965\" title=\"Flag this id='comments_for_review_986954965' style='display: none;'>\n<div class='brown_comment'>\n<span class=\"loadingLinkSpan\"><a class=\"loadingLink\" data-remote=\"true\" class=\"elementListBrownSeparator\"></div>\n\n\n\n  <div class=\"friendReviews elementListBrown\" >\n    <div class=\"section\">\n      \n\n<div id=\"review_14146684\" class=\"review\" itemprop=\"reviews\" itemscope itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Review\">\n  <link itemprop=\"url\" href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/review/show/14146684\" />\n    <a title=\"Chris\" class=\"left imgcol\" href=\"/user/show/858949-chris\"><img alt=\"Chris\" src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/users/1208350750p2/858949.jpg\" /></a>\n\n  <div class=\"left bodycol\">\n    <div class=\"reviewHeader uitext stacked\">\n        <a class=\"reviewDate createdAt right\" itemprop=\"publishDate\" href=\"/review/show/14146684?book_show_action=false\">Feb 09, 2008</a>\n\n      <a title=\"Chris\" class=\"user\" name=\"Chris\" href=\"/user/show/858949-chris\">Chris</a>\n\n        rated it\n        <span class=\" staticStars\"><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\">really liked it</span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p0\"></span></span>\n\n          <span class=\"greyText\">U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0</span>\n          <a class=\"lightGreyText\" title=\"Paperback 9780747546290\" href=\"/book/show/464164.Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban\">review of another edition</a>\n\n\n        \n\n\n          <div class=\"uitext greyText bookshelves\">\n            Shelves:\n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/858949-chris?shelf=fantasy\">fantasy</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/858949-chris?shelf=harry-potter\">harry-potter</a>\n          </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer14146684\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer8784194709708237478\"><i>Since pretty much everyone I know has read these books, I figure reviewing them is pretty pointless. But with the new book coming out in a couple of weeks, I have to go through them beginning to end. To make the reviews more entertaining, I will be doing them in a variety of unexpected formats. For this review, I will be writing as Crookshanks fan fiction.</i><br /><br />Crookshanks swished his tail back and forth as he crept up the stairs to the boys' bedrooms. He knew the rat wasn't what it was pretending to</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText8784194709708237478\" style=\"display:none\"><i>Since pretty much everyone I know has read these books, I figure reviewing them is pretty pointless. But with the new book coming out in a couple of weeks, I have to go through them beginning to end. To make the reviews more entertaining, I will be doing them in a variety of unexpected formats. For this review, I will be writing as Crookshanks fan fiction.</i><br /><br />Crookshanks swished his tail back and forth as he crept up the stairs to the boys' bedrooms. He knew the rat wasn't what it was pretending to be, but all of his attempts to alert the humans to this fact had failed. \"I don't know why I even bother,\" he muttered to himself. \"I could get along fine without any of them. Let the rat do whatever it is it's trying to do. So long as Girl keeps feeding me and scratching my belly, I'll - hello, what's this?\"<br /><br />He could smell the rat. Its scent was like nothing Crookshanks had ever smelled, and for all his time living in a magical pet shop, he'd smelled a lot. The rat did smell like a rat, yes, but there was also something else. Something... human. It was just like that big black dog he'd met on the grounds the other day. Every instinct in him had screamed to run away, but there was that smell. And even Crookshanks knew what they said about cats and curiosity. The dog had turned out to be more than just a dog, and it had convinced Crookshanks to help it. First order of business: retrieve a certain rat from the bedroom of the Red-Haired Boy.<br /><br />The Boy wasn't in, but the rat was. Crookshanks circled the bed a few times. This time, maybe, he would be able to get the damn thing. He tensed for a moment and then leapt onto the bed.<br /><br />By luck or skill, he was nearly on top of the thing when he landed. \"A-HA!\" he yowled. \"Gotcha!\" He pinned the rat under his sizable paw. \"Where you gonna run to now, ratty?\" he asked, sneering as best he could.<br /><br />The rat writhed in his grip. \"Please,\" it said. \"Just let me go. You don't know what will happen if you eat me, it would be a terrible mistake!\"<br /><br />\"A mistake, eh?\" the cat said. \"We'll see about that. I have a great big doggie friend who's just aching to get his jaws around you....\"<br /><br />He barely had time to finish his sentence when the rat went mad. It squealed and bit and slashed with its paws. And then, against all of Crookshanks' previous experience - it grew! It nearly threw the cat off the bed as it became much more massive - its legs lengthened and its arms stretched until it had reached a human size and shape. Crookshanks goggled. Of all the things he'd expected from this rat, this wasn't it. The human grabbed at him, but Crookshanks was too fast. He jumped off the bed and shimmied under the wardrobe, where he could see but not be seen.<br /><br />The human looked around, breathing heavily. He was pale and thin, and still looked ratty. \"Think, Peter, think,\" he said. \"Gotta get out of here, but...\" He stopped, glanced at the wardrobe, and grimaced. \"You may just have given me my way out, cat,\" he said. And then he bit the ball of his hand.<br /><br />Blood dripped out, leaving spreading red blotches on the sheets. \"They'll think it was you,\" he said. \"They'll leave me for dead and I'll be free to rejoin my Lord.\" He looked at the recently repaired curtains on Ron's bed. \"It's not safe here anymore.\" He sucked at the wound to stop the bloodflow and then went to the window. Perched on the windowsill, he looked over at Crookshanks' hiding place. \"If I were human,\" he said, \"the fall would kill me. But as a rat....\" His body rippled and twisted and shrank, and then there was an old grey rat on the sill. Crookshanks was pretty sure it winked at him before leaping off.<br /><br />After a minute or two, Crookshanks wriggled out from under the wardrobe, his thoughts dark. The Red-Haired Boy was going to be angry, and so was the Girl. But more importantly, the Dog was going to be furious. It was barely holding on to its sanity as it was. Crookshanks shook his head. This was going to get worse before it would get better...</span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"8784194709708237478\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n      <div class=\"reviewFooter uitext buttons\">\n          \n\n<tr class=\"no_border feedFooterReview\" id=\"update_comment_stuff_Review14146684\">\n  <td colspan=\"2\">\n    <div class=\"updateActionLinks\">\n        <a class=\"right flag\" rel=\"nofollow\" id=\"flag_link14146684\" title=\"Flag this review as inappropriate.\" href=\"/flagged/new?resource_id=14146684&resource_type=Review&return_url=/book/show/5.Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban\">flag</a>\n\n\n\n\n\n      <span class='likeItContainer' id='like_container_review_14146684'><a id=\"like_count_review_14146684\" rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"/rating/voters/14146684?resource_type=Review\"><span class=\"likesCount\">195 likes</span></a>U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0<span class=\"loadingLinkSpan\"><a id=\"like_action_review_14146684\" rel=\"nofollow\" data-like-container-id=\"like_container_review_14146684\" ref=\"like\" class=\"jsLike like_it gr-button gr-button--small loadingLink\" data-remote=\"true\" data-method=\"post\" href=\"/rating?count_on_right=false&format=json&lc=195&rating[page]=1&rating[rating]=1&rating[resource_id]=14146684&rating[resource_type]=Review\">Like</a><span class=\"loadingAnimation\"></span><span class=\"loadingError\"></span></span></span>\nU+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0<a id=\"commentLink_14146684\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"comment_form_for('review', 14146684, true, ''); return false;\">40 comments</a>U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0<a href=\"/review/show/14146684?book_show_action=false&from_review_page=1\">see review</a>\n    </div>\n\n\n    <div id='comments_for_review_14146684' style='display: none;'>\n<div class='brown_comment'>\n<span class=\"loadingLinkSpan\"><a class=\"loadingLink\" data-remote=\"true\" href=\"/review/14146684/comments?reverse=true\">View all 40 comments</a><span class=\"loadingAnimation\"></span><span class=\"loadingError\"></span></span>\n</div>\n<div id=\"comment_141591249\" class=\"brown_comment\">\n  <div class=\"xhr_comment_photo\">\n    \t<a alt=\"Evie Guo\" href=\"/user/show/44791052-evie-guo\"><img src=\"https://s.gr-assets.com/assets/nophoto/user/u_25x33-ccd24e68f4773d33a41ce08c3a34892e.png\" alt=\"U 25x33\" /></a>\n  </div>\n  <div class=\"xhr_comment_body\">\n    <a style=\"font-weight:bold\" href=\"/user/show/44791052-evie-guo\">Evie Guo</a>\n\n      \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer17645707087790606225\">i</span>\n\n    <br/>\n\n    <span class=\"xhrCommentFooter greyText\">\n      Oct 17, 2015 06:30PM\n    </span>\n\n  </div>\n  <div class=\"clear\"></div>\n</div>\n<div id=\"comment_146589369\" class=\"brown_comment\">\n  <div class=\"xhr_comment_photo\">\n    \t<a alt=\"Alicia W.       \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer9975544430736357004\"><img src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/hostedimages/1386425956ra/7362113.gif\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br><b>Still five stars.   </div>\n\n\n    <div id='comments_for_review_559980488' style='display: none;'>\n<div class='brown_comment'>\n<span class=\"loadingLinkSpan\"><a class=\"loadingLink\" data-remote=\"true\" href=\"/review/559980488/comments?reverse=true\">View all 14 comments</a><span class=\"loadingAnimation\"></span><span class=\"loadingError\"></span></span>\n</div>\n<div id=\"comment_148882471\" class=\"brown_comment\">\n  <div class=\"xhr_comment_photo\">\n    \t<a alt=\"Jenna Tomlinson\" href=\"/user/show/17180735-jenna-tomlinson\"><img src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/users/1456326582p1/17180735.jpg\" alt=\"17180735\" /></a>\n  </div>\n  <div class=\"xhr_comment_body\">\n    <a style=\"font-weight:bold\" href=\"/user/show/17180735-jenna-tomlinson\">Jenna Tomlinson</a>\n\n      \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer10781467025418764150\">I had to buy a new book. The spine of this book went to shit after the 6th reading. hahaha. href=\"/user/show/4074594-kiki\"><img alt=\"Kiki\" src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/users/1434086735p2/4074594.jpg\" /></a>\n\n  <div class=\"left bodycol\">\n    <div class=\"reviewHeader uitext stacked\">\n        <a class=\"reviewDate createdAt right\" itemprop=\"publishDate\" href=\"/review/show/154780344?book_show_action=false\">Jul 13, 2015</a>\n\n      <a title=\"Kiki\" class=\"user\" name=\"Kiki\" href=\"/user/show/4074594-kiki\">Kiki</a>\n\n        rated it\n        <span class=\" staticStars\"><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\">it was amazing</span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span></span>\n\n          <span class=\"greyText\">U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0</span>\n          <a class=\"lightGreyText\" title=\"Paperback 9781408810569\" href=\"/book/show/8723737-harry-potter-and-the-prisoner-of-azkaban\">review of another edition</a>\n\n\n        \n\n\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer154780344\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer10324040549151267159\">Literally one of the best books I've ever read. I was chained to it for two days. I cried and laughed and yelled SHIT when all of the action went down.<br /><br />I'm such a peasant for judging this series before I had read it. I read the first two and half of this one when I was about 10, before reading was cool, before I had the attention span that reading requires (I know these are kids' books but I was a particularly distracted child). I did not know, Mother Rowling. Forgive my sin, and all the times wh</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText10324040549151267159\" style=\"display:none\">Literally one of the best books I've ever read. I was chained to it for two days. I cried and laughed and yelled SHIT when all of the action went down.<br /><br />I'm such a peasant for judging this series before I had read it. I read the first two and half of this one when I was about 10, before reading was cool, before I had the attention span that reading requires (I know these are kids' books but I was a particularly distracted child). I did not know, Mother Rowling. Forgive my sin, and all the times when I said, \"I don't think Harry Potter is really my thing\". Please.<br /><br />This book was incredible and this series is a classic more than any Dickens or Middle Earth or Narnia shit has any right to be. This series isn't up it's own ass; it's so accessible and readable and meaningful.<br /><br />God damn me! How could I have been so blind?<br /><br />Forgive me, because this book changed the game. This book deserves 7 stars and I'm getting the cover art (from my edition) tattooed on my thigh.<br /><br />I'm such a fucking <i>fan</i>.</span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"10324040549151267159\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n      <div class=\"reviewFooter uitext buttons\">\n          \n\n<tr class=\"no_border class=\"review\" itemprop=\"reviews\" itemscope itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Review\">\n  <link itemprop=\"url\" href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/review/show/1556460511\" />\n    <a title=\"Brina\" class=\"left imgcol\" href=\"/user/show/2933855-brina\"><img alt=\"Brina\" src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/users/1454067566p2/2933855.jpg\" /></a>\n\n  <div class=\"left bodycol\">\n    <div class=\"reviewHeader uitext stacked\">\n        <a class=\"reviewDate createdAt right\" itemprop=\"publishDate\" href=\"/review/show/1556460511?book_show_action=false\">Mar 30, 2016</a>\n\n      <a title=\"Brina\" class=\"user\" name=\"Brina\" href=\"/user/show/2933855-brina\">Brina</a>\n\n        rated it\n        <span class=\" staticStars\"><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\">it was amazing</span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span></span>\n\n\n\n        \n\n\n          <div class=\"uitext greyText bookshelves\">\n            Shelves:\n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/2933855-brina?shelf=rereads\">rereads</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/2933855-brina?shelf=j-k-rowling\">j-k-rowling</a>\n          </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer1556460511\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer11879251772818206790\">Harry Potter for me is like warm apple pie and vanilla ice cream. It is the ultimate comfort read. This must have been at least the 10th time I've read it but I have lost track. The theme I can take out of this particular book especially after reading it all these times is hope. Harry largely naive for most of the first three books, meets Sirius for the first time and his world changes. For ever so briefly he thinks he can leave the Dursleys for good and live entirely in the wizarding world. Of</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText11879251772818206790\" style=\"display:none\">Harry Potter for me is like warm apple pie and vanilla ice cream. It is the ultimate comfort read. This must have been at least the 10th time I've read it but I have lost track. The theme I can take out of this particular book especially after reading it all these times is hope. Harry largely naive for most of the first three books, meets Sirius for the first time and his world changes. For ever so briefly he thinks he can leave the Dursleys for good and live entirely in the wizarding world. Of course, we know what happens next ;). The last 100 pages of this book for me are my favorite 100 pages of the series aside maybe from the end of Deathly Hallows, especially because (in my opinion) I feel the movie most closely resembles the book. This is usually the time of year when I reread the septology, and I am looking forward to feeling magical again as though it's my first time reading these books. Like that slice of warm apple pie, I am comforted knowing that for a few hours I can enter Harry's world. </span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"11879251772818206790\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n      <div class=\"reviewFooter uitext buttons\">\n          \n\n<tr class=\"no_border feedFooterReview\" id=\"update_comment_stuff_Review1556460511\">\n  <td colspan=\"2\">\n    <div class=\"updateActionLinks\">\n        <a class=\"right flag\" rel=\"nofollow\" id=\"flag_link1556460511\" title=\"Flag this review as inappropriate.\" href=\"/flagged/new?resource_id=1556460511&resource_type=Review&return_url=/book/show/5.Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban\">flag</a>\n\n\n\n\n\n      <span class='likeItContainer' id='like_container_review_1556460511'><a id=\"like_count_review_1556460511\" rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"/rating/voters/1556460511?resource_type=Review\"><span class=\"likesCount\">124 likes</span></a>U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0<span class=\"loadingLinkSpan\"><a id=\"like_action_review_1556460511\" rel=\"nofollow\" data-like-container-id=\"like_container_review_1556460511\" ref=\"like\" class=\"jsLike like_it gr-button gr-button--small loadingLink\" data-remote=\"true\" data-method=\"post\" href=\"/rating?count_on_right=false&format=json&lc=124&rating[page]=1&rating[rating]=1&rating[resource_id]=1556460511&rating[resource_type]=Review\">Like</a><span class=\"loadingAnimation\"></span><span class=\"loadingError\"></span></span></span>\nU+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0<a id=\"commentLink_1556460511\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"comment_form_for('review', 1556460511, true, ''); I read for the first time when I was 8. I have to my 8 year old to read and she said they were boring :(. I was</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText12145560233880764812\" style=\"display:none\">Suanne I still have all 5 books. I read for the first time when I was 8.      \n\n<div id=\"review_1465110878\" class=\"review\" itemprop=\"reviews\" itemscope itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Review\">\n  <link itemprop=\"url\" href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/review/show/1465110878\" />\n    <a title=\"Delee\" class=\"left imgcol\" href=\"/user/show/6168268-delee\"><img alt=\"Delee\" src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/users/1431034088p2/6168268.jpg\" /></a>\n\n  <div class=\"left bodycol\">\n    <div class=\"reviewHeader uitext stacked\">\n        <a class=\"reviewDate createdAt right\" itemprop=\"publishDate\" href=\"/review/show/1465110878?book_show_action=false\">Jan 04, 2016</a>\n\n      <a title=\"Delee\" class=\"user\" name=\"Delee\" href=\"/user/show/6168268-delee\">Delee</a>\n\n        rated it\n        <span class=\" staticStars\"><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\">it was amazing</span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span></span>\n\n\n\n        \n\n\n          <div class=\"uitext greyText bookshelves\">\n            Shelves:\n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/6168268-delee?shelf=favorites\">favorites</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/6168268-delee?shelf=ya\">ya</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/6168268-delee?shelf=coming-of-age\">coming-of-age</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/6168268-delee?shelf=fantasy\">fantasy</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/6168268-delee?shelf=reviewed\">reviewed</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/6168268-delee?shelf=buddy-read\">buddy-read</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/6168268-delee?shelf=stepheny-made-me\">stepheny-made-me</a>\n          </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer1465110878\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer11883039515265234659\">Buddy-read with two of my Great Escape gal pals- <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/review/show/241902728?comment=145377249#comment_145377249\">Stepheny</a> and <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/review/show/104910588\">Ivonne</a>.<br><br><img class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><img src=\"https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/hostedimages/1451887137i/17616722.jpg\" alt=\" photo 8c2dfbee-747b-4477-853c-86940b726771_zpsfet1adlx.jpg\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br>Be on the look out for Stepheny Potthead aka The Book Pusher aka Quick Draw Stepheny aka The Nutty Professor. Last seen running along side the Knight Bus with Harry Potter's invisible cloak. Also Suspected in the kidnapping of fellow Goodreader Jeff and best-selling author Stephen King. Blonde Hair...big green doll eyes, has a frightening maniacal cackle and a tendency to whine when she doesn't get her way. LOUDLY. Considered a</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText11883039515265234659\" style=\"display:none\">Buddy-read with two of my Great Escape gal pals- <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/review/show/241902728?comment=145377249#comment_145377249\">Stepheny</a> and <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/review/show/104910588\">Ivonne</a>.<br><br><img class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><img src=\"https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/hostedimages/1451887137i/17616722.jpg\" alt=\" photo 8c2dfbee-747b-4477-853c-86940b726771_zpsfet1adlx.jpg\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br>Be on the look out for Stepheny Potthead aka The Book Pusher aka Quick Draw Stepheny aka The Nutty Professor. Last seen running along side the Knight Bus with Harry Potter's invisible cloak. Also Suspected in the kidnapping of fellow Goodreader Jeff and best-selling author Stephen King. Blonde Hair...big green doll eyes, has a frightening maniacal cackle and a tendency to whine when she doesn't get her way. LOUDLY. Considered armed and dangerous- approach with caution...and Nerds- she likes Nerds.<br><br>Now back to our regularly scheduled review....<br><br>I don't listen to a lot of audio-books (I prefer to read) but I was kind of falling behind in my reading commitments...and I had put Ms. Stepheny off again and again for this buddy-read soooooo many times- I couldn't do it again to her (she pouts..and she gets all mopey and it is JUST heartbreaking). I am so happy I listened to this one- Stephen Fry was just perfect. Perfect!..and HARRY POTTER AND THE PRISONER OF AZKABAN was just the thing to put me in the Christmas Spirit. <br><br><img class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><img src=\"https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/hostedimages/1451887137i/17616723.jpg\" alt=\" photo d51ae6fc-03d0-4b40-b874-97ea5a32aa63_zps6vo1u0fq.jpg\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br>It's Harry's least favorite time of year- school break spent with the Dursleys...and this visit isn't going well. First: News that Sirius Black has escaped from Azkaban- Second: An unfortunate accident involving mean Aunt Marge...<br><br><img class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><img src=\"https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/hostedimages/1451887137i/17616724.jpg\" alt=\" photo a7ff8064-9033-464d-b889-658eceb341fe_zpsatrxuapa.jpg\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br>Harry decides not to stick around- and catches the Knight Bus to Diagon Alley- where instead of getting in trouble for using magic away from Hogwarts, he gets invited to stay until school begins, by Cornelius Fudge-the Minister for Magic.<br><br><img class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><img src=\"https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/hostedimages/1451887137i/17616725.jpg\" alt=\" photo c7e24bac-45b7-432e-8533-fe006f247450_zpscu29pvjp.jpg\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br>The night before he is expected to leave- Harry is warned that Sirius may have escaped with murder in mind- and HE may be the target....<br><br>This is my favorite of the series so far!! I loved that it was still light and fun...but that the darkness is slooooooooowly creeping in.<br><br>I loved that a lot of it took place during the Christmas Holidays...<br><br><img class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><img src=\"https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/hostedimages/1451887138i/17616727.jpg\" alt=\" photo bb1d20ee-dd9d-4eab-9fe8-c2722a4e0e75_zpskjbirexq.jpg\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br>I really liked the addition of the Dementors...spoooooky...<br><br><img class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><img src=\"https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/hostedimages/1451887137i/17616726.jpg\" alt=\" photo 757e5100-3fef-4bf7-87bc-0cf6c603852b_zpsl9sagtcu.jpg\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br>...and I adored Buckbeak!!<br><br><img class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><img src=\"https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/hostedimages/1451887138i/17616728.jpg\" alt=\" photo ff169a79-0f81-4477-94f4-bd6f5b23efba_zpsz5vic02h.jpg\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br>As for the whereabouts of Stepheny? I can almost guarantee...she is up to no good.<br><br><img class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><img src=\"https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/hostedimages/1451887138i/17616729.jpg\" alt=\" photo 21fac931-9a35-4f5c-8369-e0a3b87a5d8a_zps2h4uwd2c.jpg\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br><br><br><br><br><br></span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"11883039515265234659\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n      <div class=\"reviewFooter uitext buttons\">\n          \n\n<tr class=\"no_border id=\"reviewTextContainer1536551381\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer3225257694607045889\"><br /><i> <b>U+00E2 U+0080 U+009CYou think the dead we love ever truly leave us? You think that we donU+00E2 U+0080 U+0099t recall them more clearly than ever in times of great trouble?U+00E2 U+0080 U+009D</b> </i> <br /><br />*Guess which character said the above quote. <a class=\"jsShowSpoiler spoilerAction\">(view spoiler)</a><span class=\"spoilerContainer\" style=\"display: none\">[ Dumbledore, duh! <a class=\"jsHideSpoiler spoilerAction\">(hide spoiler)</a>]</span><br /><br /><b>The following isnU+00E2 U+0080 U+0099t really a review, more like random thoughts while and after reading the magical book:</b><br /><br />1. Aunt Marge deserved it alright. Lol. <br />2. IU+00E2 U+0080 U+0099m against hurting kids but could I make a bloody exception with Draco? <br />3. I enjoyed every class with Prof. Lupin. I agre</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText3225257694607045889\" style=\"display:none\"><br /><i>\n  <b>U+00E2 U+0080 U+009CYou think the dead we love ever truly leave us? You think that we donU+00E2 U+0080 U+0099t recall them more clearly than ever in times of great trouble?U+00E2 U+0080 U+009D</b>\n</i> <br /><br />*Guess which character said the above quote. <a class=\"jsShowSpoiler spoilerAction\">(view spoiler)</a><span class=\"spoilerContainer\" style=\"display: none\">[ Dumbledore, duh!  <a class=\"jsHideSpoiler spoilerAction\">(hide spoiler)</a>]</span><br /><br /><b>The following isnU+00E2 U+0080 U+0099t really a review, more like random thoughts while and after reading the magical book:</b><br /><br />1. Aunt Marge deserved it alright. Lol. <br />2. IU+00E2 U+0080 U+0099m against hurting kids but could I make a bloody exception with Draco? <br />3. I enjoyed every class with Prof. Lupin. I agree heU+00E2 U+0080 U+0099s the best Dark Arts Professor so far but true to my premonitionU+00E2 U+0080 U+00A6 <a class=\"jsShowSpoiler spoilerAction\">(view spoiler)</a><span class=\"spoilerContainer\" style=\"display: none\">[He wouldnU+00E2 U+0080 U+0099t last more than a year.  <a class=\"jsHideSpoiler spoilerAction\">(hide spoiler)</a>]</span><br />4. Perhaps I could use a cute U+00E2 U+0080 U+009CridikulusU+00E2 U+0080 U+009D spell on a boss when his gloomy face comes hovering above my desk.^^<br />5. I hate to say it but Hermione is always right. Love her! Lol.<br />6. The movie is awesome but I couldnU+00E2 U+0080 U+0099t help notice important things missing like the GryffindorU+00E2 U+0080 U+0099s match against Ravenclaw and later against Slytherin. <br />7. In the movie, Firebolt arrived only at the end of the story. <br />8. Buckbeak and Crookshanks=Their movie versions are so much cuter! <3<br />9. MarauderU+00E2 U+0080 U+0099s map is too cool, like a GPS only so much more fantastic! Love how it was made in the movie.^^<br />10. Ms. Rowling, you have my complete respect and admiration, you amazing woman, you!</span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"3225257694607045889\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n      <div class=\"reviewFooter uitext buttons\">\n          \n\n<tr class=\"no_border feedFooterReview\" (ReadWithMikee)\" href=\"/user/show/44137919-mikee-andrea-readwithmikee\">Mikee Andrea (ReadWithMikee)</a>\n\n        rated it\n        <span class=\" staticStars\"><span title=\"really liked it\"          <span class=\"greyText\">U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0</span>\n          <a class=\"lightGreyText\" title=\"Hardcover 9781408855911\" href=\"/book/show/22037424-harry-potter-and-the-prisoner-of-azkaban\">review of another edition</a>\n\n\n        \n\n\n          <div class=\"uitext greyText bookshelves\">\n            Shelves:\n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/44137919-mikee-andrea-readwithmikee?shelf=favorites\">favorites</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/44137919-mikee-andrea-readwithmikee?shelf=books-i-own\">books-i-own</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/44137919-mikee-andrea-readwithmikee?shelf=favorite-covers\">favorite-covers</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/44137919-mikee-andrea-readwithmikee?shelf=favorite-series\">favorite-series</a>\n          </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer1405697939\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer15096746101551210605\">OKAY. This book was fantastic! I can't get over how everything just fell into place perfectly. Prisoner of Azkaban is my favorite of the series so far which is actually a surprise since Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban was my least favorite movie growing up.<br /><br />But reading and watching the movie truly is a different experience. Even though I've seen the movies repeatedly year after year, I was still on my toes while I was turning the pages of my book. It was like I was seeing all of this for</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText15096746101551210605\" style=\"display:none\">OKAY. This book was fantastic! I can't get over how everything just fell into place perfectly. Prisoner of Azkaban is my favorite of the series so far which is actually a surprise since Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban was my least favorite movie growing up.<br /><br />But reading and watching the movie truly is a different experience. Even though I've seen the movies repeatedly year after year, I was still on my toes while I was turning the pages of my book. It was like I was seeing all of this for the first time!<br /><br />I've really developed a deeper love, respect, and understanding for this series and the Wizarding world. I especially loved the fact that we actually got to learn about Remus Lupin and his backstory as a werewolf. I never would've learned any of this if I never decided to pick up these books.<br /><br />This series just gets better and better, and darker and darker. I can slowly see how Harry Potter is moving away from middle grade and into young adult. I'm really looking forward to how that shift becomes more prominent in the later books. Now next up is Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire, which is my favorite movie of the series growing up! Let's see how this one will go!</span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"15096746101551210605\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n class=\"reviewHeader uitext stacked\">\n        <a class=\"reviewDate createdAt right\" itemprop=\"publishDate\" href=\"/review/show/18611960?book_show_action=false\">Dec 02, 2010</a>\n\n      <a class=\"greyText\">U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0</span>\n          <a class=\"lightGreyText\" title=\"Paperback 9780747546290\" href=\"/book/show/464164.Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban\">review of another edition</a>\n\n\n        \n\n\n          <div class=\"uitext greyText bookshelves\">\n            Shelves:\n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/1022982-brad?shelf=faves\">faves</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/1022982-brad?shelf=fantasy\">fantasy</a>, \n              <a           <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/1022982-brad?shelf=out-loud\">out-loud</a>\n          </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer18611960\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer2712243565268206162\">I know that many of you out there haven't gotten around to reading <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/5.Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban__Harry_Potter___3_\" title=\"Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (Harry Potter, #3) by J.K. Rowling\">Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban</a>. Much like Umberto Eco's <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/17841.Foucault_s_Pendulum\" title=\"Foucault's Pendulum by Umberto Eco\">Foucault's Pendulum</a>, Germaine Greer's <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/98532.The_Female_Eunuch\" title=\"The Female Eunuch by Germaine Greer\">The Female Eunuch</a> and Lucifer's worldwide bestseller <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/2284803.Holy_Bible_The_New_King_James_Version\" title=\"Holy Bible The New King James Version by Anonymous\">The Holy Bible</a>, you own a copy, it gathers dust, but its never been read. You've been thinking about it, though. You see it there on the shelf and you wonder, \"Is this book for me?\"<br /><br />The following checklist will tell you all you need to know about <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/5.Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban__Harry_Potter___3_\" title=\"Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (Harry Potter, #3) by J.K. Rowling\">Harry Potter and the Prisoner</a></span>\n  <span id=\"freeText2712243565268206162\" style=\"display:none\">I know that many of you out there haven't gotten around to reading <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/5.Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban__Harry_Potter___3_\" title=\"Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (Harry Potter, #3) by J.K. Rowling\">Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban</a>. Much like Umberto Eco's <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/17841.Foucault_s_Pendulum\" title=\"Foucault's Pendulum by Umberto Eco\">Foucault's Pendulum</a>, Germaine Greer's <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/98532.The_Female_Eunuch\" title=\"The Female Eunuch by Germaine Greer\">The Female Eunuch</a> and Lucifer's worldwide bestseller <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/2284803.Holy_Bible_The_New_King_James_Version\" title=\"Holy Bible The New King James Version by Anonymous\">The Holy Bible</a>, you own a copy, it gathers dust, but its never been read. You've been thinking about it, though. You see it there on the shelf and you wonder, \"Is this book for me?\"<br /><br />The following checklist will tell you all you need to know about <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/5.Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban__Harry_Potter___3_\" title=\"Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban (Harry Potter, #3) by J.K. Rowling\">Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban</a>'s suitability for you. The more checkmarks you have, the more you need to tackle this wonder of modern literature.<br /><br />1. Do you have Daddy issues? U+00E2 U+009C U+0093 or U+00E2 U+009C U+0098<br />2. Has a creepy middle aged man been sleeping with you for years, unbeknownst to you? U+00E2 U+009C U+0093 or U+00E2 U+009C U+0098<br />3. Does the full moon make you anxious? U+00E2 U+009C U+0093 or U+00E2 U+009C U+0098<br />4. Have you ever gorged on chocolate to combat depression? U+00E2 U+009C U+0093 or U+00E2 U+009C U+0098<br />5. Do you find there just isn't enough time in the day? U+00E2 U+009C U+0093 or U+00E2 U+009C U+0098<br />6. Are you misunderstood? U+00E2 U+009C U+0093 or U+00E2 U+009C U+0098<br />7. Do you have an overactive sense of justice that gets you into trouble? U+00E2 U+009C U+0093 or U+00E2 U+009C U+0098<br />8. Do you break rules whenever you can? U+00E2 U+009C U+0093 or U+00E2 U+009C U+0098<br />9. Do you scoff at personal danger, especially when it gets in the way of your fun? U+00E2 U+009C U+0093 or U+00E2 U+009C U+0098<br />10. Are you a dog lover, or would you like to be one? U+00E2 U+009C U+0093 or U+00E2 U+009C U+0098<br /><br /><br />1-2: You'd probably rather be reading <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/442140.Finnegans_Wake__Penguin_Twentieth_Century_Classics_\" title=\"Finnegans Wake (Penguin Twentieth-Century Classics) by James Joyce\">Finnegan's Wake</a>, <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/323355.The_Book_of_Mormon_Another_Testament_of_Jesus_Christ__Official_Edition_\" title=\"The Book of Mormon Another Testament of Jesus Christ (Official Edition) by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints\">The Book of Mormon</a> or <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/938600.Dick_And_Jane_Fun_Wherever_We_Are\" title=\"Dick And Jane Fun Wherever We Are by Anonymous\">Sally Dick and Jane</a><br />3-5: Skip it and watch the movie.<br />6-8: Time to dust off that copy and give it a whirl.<br />9-10: Put your existential crisis aside. Shave your moustache. Take a day off work, and read this book. It won't change your life, but it'll be like reading about your dream self.<br /><br />Do as you will. </span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"2712243565268206162\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n      <div class=\"reviewFooter uitext buttons\">\n          \n\n<tr class=\"no_border feedFooterReview\" class=\"review\" itemprop=\"reviews\" itemscope itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Review\">\n  <link itemprop=\"url\" href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/review/show/1303982685\" />\n    <a title=\"P \" class=\"left imgcol\" href=\"/user/show/25327841-p\"><img alt=\"P \" src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/users/1469415764p2/25327841.jpg\" /></a>\n\n  <div class=\"left bodycol\">\n    <div class=\"reviewHeader uitext stacked\">\n        <a class=\"reviewDate createdAt right\" itemprop=\"publishDate\" href=\"/review/show/1303982685?book_show_action=false\">Jul 21, 2016</a>\n\n      <a title=\"P \" class=\"user\" name=\"P \" href=\"/user/show/25327841-p\">P </a>\n\n        rated it\n        <span class=\" staticStars\"><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\">it was amazing</span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span></span>\n\n          <span class=\"greyText\">U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0</span>\n          <a class=\"lightGreyText\" title=\"Paperback 9780545582933\" href=\"/book/show/17347383-harry-potter-and-the-prisoner-of-azkaban\">review of another edition</a>\n\n\n        \n\n\n          <div class=\"uitext greyText bookshelves\">\n            Shelves:\n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/25327841-p?shelf=young-adult\">young-adult</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/25327841-p?shelf=favorites-2015\">favorites-2015</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/25327841-p?shelf=re-read\">re-read</a>\n          </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer1303982685\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer4463616795612530529\"><b> <blockquote>U+00E2 U+0080 U+009CI solemnly swear that I am up to no good.U+00E2 U+0080 U+009D</blockquote> </b><br><br><img src=\"https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/hostedimages/1456461407i/18236981.jpg\" width=\"400\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br><b>Re-read - </b> Only the Quidditch scenes earned five stars from me. This book is EPIC. Suffice to say that Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban is the best of the series. The story gets darker and more complex than the previous books. Harry, Ron and Hermiome don't chase the clue this time, they have to find a way to guard their lives from the most horrendous prisoner, Sirius Black.<br><br><img src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/hostedimages/1456461407ra/18236982.gif\" width=\"400\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br><b> <blockquote>U+00E2 U+0080 U+009CHarry Potter was a highly unusual boy in many ways.U+00E2 U+0080 U+009D </blockquote> </b><br><br>Harry grows up</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText4463616795612530529\" style=\"display:none\"><b>\n  <blockquote>U+00E2 U+0080 U+009CI solemnly swear that I am up to no good.U+00E2 U+0080 U+009D</blockquote>\n</b><br><br><img src=\"https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/hostedimages/1456461407i/18236981.jpg\" width=\"400\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br><b>Re-read - </b> Only the Quidditch scenes earned five stars from me. This book is EPIC. Suffice to say that Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban is the best of the series. The story gets darker and more complex than the previous books. Harry, Ron and Hermiome don't chase the clue this time, they have to find a way to guard their lives from the most horrendous prisoner, Sirius Black.<br><br><img src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/hostedimages/1456461407ra/18236982.gif\" width=\"400\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br><b>\n  <blockquote>U+00E2 U+0080 U+009CHarry Potter was a highly unusual boy in many ways.U+00E2 U+0080 U+009D </blockquote>\n</b><br><br>Harry grows up through this book, he tries to learn new magic and overcome his fear. Dementors are the symbol Rowling created to stand for your fear in the deepest of your mind, and it quite works for me very well, this creature makes the book gloomy and grey. I loved the scene when <a class=\"jsShowSpoiler spoilerAction\">(view spoiler)</a><span class=\"spoilerContainer\" style=\"display: none\">[Harry is fell from his broom. <a class=\"jsHideSpoiler spoilerAction\">(hide spoiler)</a>]</span>, it's everything to me. PERFECTION.<br><br><img src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/hostedimages/1456461407ra/18236983.gif\" width=\"400\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br>And the movie, oh no ! I don't want to talk about the movie on this page but let me. It is very amazing and captivating, I extrememly like about time travel, it's pure magic. For the first time I read this book, I gasped and gasped and gasped and couldn't stop gasping for the ending. It's what I asked for and it's perfect. Trust me, this book is the last book that will leave you feel whole after you finish it. Because in the next one, this feeling will vanish and it's hurt like Avada Kedavra running through your heart !<br><br><blockquote>\n  <b>U+00E2 U+0080 U+009CI don't go looking for trouble. Trouble usually finds me.U+00E2 U+0080 U+009D</b>\n</blockquote><br><br>More at <a target=\"_blank\" href=\"http://goo.gl/0s2GmI\" rel=\"nofollow\">http://goo.gl/0s2GmI</a></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></[\"br\"]></span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"4463616795612530529\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n      <div class=\"reviewFooter uitext </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer1243658826\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer7925989485842181745\"><i>U+201CHappiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.U+201D</i><br /><br />When I finished <i>Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban</i> for the first time, it immediately became my next favourite book. J. K. Rowling outdid herself, and wrote something even bigger and better than before. And she'll keep doing it for another 4 books.<br /><br />There's just nothing to criticise about book 3. Compared to the other books there's not a single scene that makes me uncomfortable, that I'd prefer</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText7925989485842181745\" style=\"display:none\"><i>U+201CHappiness can be found, even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.U+201D</i><br /><br />When I finished <i>Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban</i> for the first time, it immediately became my next favourite book. J. K. Rowling outdid herself, and wrote something even bigger and better than before. And she'll keep doing it for another 4 books.<br /><br />There's just nothing to criticise about book 3. Compared to the other books there's not a single scene that makes me uncomfortable, that I'd prefer to skip rather than experience it again. I particularly admire Hermione, our favourite genius witch. Keeping all those immense secrets, kicking butt, being the best student of her age, suffering Ron's sideswipes and punching Malfoy in the face can't ever be beaten. Hermione seriously managed her mischief.</span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"7925989485842181745\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n href=\"/review/list/43850323-reynita-maharani-the-night-reader?shelf=i-want-to-live-in-this-world\">i-want-to-live-in-this-world</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/43850323-reynita-maharani-the-night-reader?shelf=low-expectation-great-story-i-got\">low-expectation-great-story-i-got</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/43850323-reynita-maharani-the-night-reader?shelf=so-funny-lol\">so-funny-lol</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/43850323-reynita-maharani-the-night-reader?shelf=original-and-fresh-story\">original-and-fresh-story</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/43850323-reynita-maharani-the-night-reader?shelf=middle-grade\">middle-grade</a>\n          </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n                  <em>\n                    This review has been hidden because it contains spoilers. To view it,\n                    <a href=\"#\" onclick=\"Effect.toggle('reviewTextContainer1747406528'); return false;\">click here.</a>\n                  </em>\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer1747406528\" class=\"readable\"\n                    style=\"display:none\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer7899964087537446433\"><s>REVIEW TO COME ON SATURDAY.</s><br><br><b>4.9 stars</b><br><br><b> <i>\" Welcome to the Knight Bus, emergency transport for the stranded witch or wizard. Just stick out your wand, step on board and we can take you anywhere you want to go. \"</i> </b><br><br>Harry Potter is a 13 year old boy now. He stays at his uncle's and aunt's house like he usually does for the whole summer. But this year is different, he can not control his anger anymore and he leaves his uncle's and aunt's house. <br>There is also a man named Sirius Black, <b>Mass-Murderer and fol</b></span>\n  <span id=\"freeText7899964087537446433\" style=\"display:none\"><s>REVIEW TO COME ON SATURDAY.</s><br><br><b>4.9 stars</b><br><br><b>\n  <i>\" Welcome to the Knight Bus, emergency transport for the stranded witch or wizard. Just stick out your wand, step on board and we can take you anywhere you want to go. \"</i>\n</b><br><br>Harry Potter is a 13 year old boy now. He stays at his uncle's and aunt's house like he usually does for the whole summer. But this year is different, he can not control his anger anymore and he leaves his uncle's and aunt's house. <br>There is also a man named Sirius Black, <b>Mass-Murderer and follower of Lord Voldemort</b> escaped from Azkaban. Most prisoners go mad withins weeks in Azkaban but this man doesn't and people say that he is coming after Harry and in Harry's first divination class, Professor Trelawney sees an omen of death in Harry's tea leaves and now, the school grounds are being Patrolled by <b>DEMENTORS.</b><br><br>My Opinion <br><br>The cover of this book is so BEAUTIFUL! and the story was as amazing as the cover.<br>I also found a new favorite character in this book and this person is Professor Lupin!! He is so cool and he is the best Defence Against The Dark Arts teacher I have ever met. because you know, all the Defence Against The Dark Arts teachers from the first book were not nice guys at all including that guy with useless ability. What's his name again?? LOCHART! GILDEROY LOCHART. I just remembered his name. Actually, where is he now? no one mentioned him and I hope I won't see him as a teacher in Hogwarts again. I still can't forgive him for what he was about to do with Ron and Harry in the second book. That guy is pathetic.<br><br><img src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/hostedimages/1474119666ra/20557164.gif\" width=\"250\" height=\"200\" alt=\"description\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br>I loved all the characters in this book and Fred and George weasley were so funny in this book. Percy is the last person I like. I don't hate him but I don't really like him too. He's so stritch about rules and sometimes he annoys me but not much. here is my favorite scene : <br><br><i>'How're we getting to King's Cross tomorrow, Dad?' asked Fred, as they tucked into a sumptuous chocolate pudding.<br>'The Ministry's providing a couple of cars,' said Mr Weasley. <br> everyone looked up at him.<br>'Why?' said Percy curiously.<br>'it's because of you, Perce,' said George seriously. 'And there'll be little flags on the bonnets, with HB on them -'<br>'- for humungous Bighead,' said Fred. <br>Everyone except Percy and Mrs Weasley snorted into their pudding. </i><br><br><img src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/hostedimages/1474122022ra/20557842.gif\" width=\"250\" height=\"180\" alt=\"description\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"><br><br>I laughed so hard in the middle of the night because of this. I wish I were there to see Percy's face when Fred and George said that. Oh! and I remembered I laughed so hard too when Ginny said he found out that Percy was kissing Penelope Clearwater, his girlfriend. I mean Percy is so stritch about rules and he always study, study, study, so the thought of Percy's having a girlfriend was never crossed my mind. But he was cool enough to get a girlfriend. *shrugs*<br><br>I was so shocked when I found out that Sirius was innocent and the bad guy was Peter Pettigrew. <br>how could he betray his own bestfriend?! I think he did it to save his own skin without thinking twice about his bestfriend's life. James and Lily Potter died because of him and how dare he to say that Sirius was the one who betrayed James Potter! this guy is more pathetic than Gilderoy and I was shocked when Harry told Lupin and Sirius not to kill him and put him in Azkaban instead. That moment I realised that Harry was so kind. this guy was the reason his parents died and he didn't want him to be killed. <br><br>This book also have the best ending. the ending in this book made me grinning but don't get me wrong, the ending in the first and the second book were all great too but this ending was perfect. <br><br><i>'What's that?' he snarled, staring at the envelope Harry was still clutching in his hand. 'if it's another form for me to sign, you've got another -' <br>'it's not,' said Harry cheerfully. ' it's a letter from my godfather.' <br>'Godfather?' spluttered Uncle Vernon. 'you haven't got a godfather!.'<br>'Yes I hav,' said Harry brightly. 'He was my mum and dad's best friend. He's a convicted murderer, but he's broken out of wizard prison and he's on the run. He likes to keep in touch with me, though... keep up with my news... check I'm happy...'<br>And grinning broadly at the look of horror on Uncle Vernon's face, Harry set off towards the station exit, Hedwig rattling along in front of him, for what looked like a much better summer than the last. </i><br><br>Thank you guys for reading and liking my review. Hope you all have a great day!! class=\"elementListBrownSeparator\"></div>\n\n\n\n  <div class=\"friendReviews elementListBrown\" >\n    <div class=\"section\">\n      \n\n<div id=\"review_419799152\" class=\"review\" itemprop=\"reviews\" itemscope itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Review\">\n  <link itemprop=\"url\" href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/review/show/419799152\" />\n    <a title=\"Jessica U+2741 U+27B3 Silverbow U+27B3 U+2741 Rabid Reads\" class=\"left imgcol\" href=\"/user/show/10336538-jessica-silverbow-rabid-reads\"><img alt=\"Jessica U+2741 U+27B3 Silverbow U+27B3 U+2741 Rabid Reads\" src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/users/1393785730p2/10336538.jpg\" /></a>\n\n  <div class=\"left bodycol\">\n    <div class=\"reviewHeader uitext stacked\">\n        <a class=\"reviewDate createdAt right\" itemprop=\"publishDate\" href=\"/review/show/419799152?book_show_action=false\">Aug 27, 2016</a>\n\n      <a title=\"Jessica U+2741 U+27B3 Silverbow U+27B3 U+2741 Rabid Reads\" class=\"user\" name=\"Jessica U+2741 U+27B3 Silverbow U+27B3 U+2741 Rabid Reads\" href=\"/user/show/10336538-jessica-silverbow-rabid-reads\">Jessica U+2741 U+27B3 Silverbow U+27B3 U+2741 Rabid Reads</a>\n\n        rated it\n        <span class=\" staticStars\"><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\">it was amazing</span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span></span>\n\n\n\n        \n\n\n          <div class=\"uitext greyText bookshelves\">\n            Shelves:\n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/10336538-jessica-silverbow-rabid-reads?shelf=childrens-books\">childrens-books</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/10336538-jessica-silverbow-rabid-reads?shelf=favorites-ya\">favorites-ya</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/10336538-jessica-silverbow-rabid-reads?shelf=banned-books\">banned-books</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/10336538-jessica-silverbow-rabid-reads?shelf=best-of-the-best\">best-of-the-best</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/10336538-jessica-silverbow-rabid-reads?shelf=i-sobbed-audibly\">i-sobbed-audibly</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/10336538-jessica-silverbow-rabid-reads?shelf=buddy-reads-are-the-best\">buddy-reads-are-the-best</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/10336538-jessica-silverbow-rabid-reads?shelf=audible\">audible</a>\n          </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer419799152\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer10614032503192465323\">So I was <i>supposed</i> to buddy read this with <b> <a href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/group/show/148164\" target=\"_blank\">BB&B</a> </b>, but then Rickman, so I binge read it in a day, and here we are. <br /><br />Whatever. This is my favorite book in the series. I'll write a full review when I can think about Harry Potter without feeling like I've been sucker punched. <br /><br /></span>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n      <div class=\"reviewFooter uitext buttons\">\n          \n\n<tr class=\"no_border feedFooterReview\" id=\"update_comment_stuff_Review419799152\">\n  <td colspan=\"2\">\n    <div class=\"updateActionLinks\">\n        <a class=\"right flag\" rel=\"nofollow\" id=\"flag_link419799152\" title=\"Flag this review as inappropriate.\" href=\"/flagged/new?resource_id=419799152&resource_type=Review&return_url=/book/show/5.Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban\">flag</a>\n\n\n\n\n\n      <span class='likeItContainer' id='like_container_review_419799152'><a id=\"like_count_review_419799152\" rel=\"nofollow\" href=\"/rating/voters/419799152?resource_type=Review\"><span class=\"likesCount\">71 likes</span></a>U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0<span class=\"loadingLinkSpan\"><a id=\"like_action_review_419799152\" rel=\"nofollow\" data-like-container-id=\"like_container_review_419799152\" ref=\"like\" class=\"jsLike like_it gr-button gr-button--small loadingLink\" data-remote=\"true\" data-method=\"post\" href=\"/rating?count_on_right=false&format=json&lc=71&rating[page]=1&rating[rating]=1&rating[resource_id]=419799152&rating[resource_type]=Review\">Like</a><span class=\"loadingAnimation\"></span><span class=\"loadingError\"></span></span></span>\nU+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0<a id=\"commentLink_419799152\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"comment_form_for('review', 419799152, true, ''); class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"></a><br><br>The third book in the Harry Potter series is by far the best of the first three. We get introduced to Sirius Black early on in the book, and I have to say, heU+2019s my favorite character to date in the series. Getting more answers about HarryU+2019s parents and past, you can tell this book sets up so many things for future books. <br><br>Sirius and Remus were the best part of the book for me. I could see where THIS would be the book that hooks so many HP fans. DonU+2019t get me wrong, the first two are good, but the</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText8782917379395917565\" style=\"display:none\"><a href=\"http://s1279.photobucket.com/user/Christyb23/media/Book Reviews 9/stencil.facebook-post_zpsgwn7z13e.jpg.html\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"nofollow\">\n  <img src=\"https://i.gr-assets.com/images/S/compressed.photo.goodreads.com/hostedimages/1474968246i/20662203._SX540_.jpg\" alt=\" photo stencil.facebook-post_zpsgwn7z13e.jpg\" class=\"gr-hostedUserImg\"></a><br><br>The third book in the Harry Potter series is by far the best of the first three. We get introduced to Sirius Black early on in the book, and I have to say, heU+2019s my favorite character to date in the series. Getting more answers about HarryU+2019s parents and past, you can tell this book sets up so many things for future books. <br><br>Sirius and Remus were the best part of the book for me. I could see where THIS would be the book that hooks so many HP fans. DonU+2019t get me wrong, the first two are good, but there was something special about this book. Something that makes me want to jump into book 4 asap. This world is magical and yes, the books are so much better than the movies (which IU+2019ve seen multiple times) and IU+2019m so happy IU+2019m reading them! 5 stars!</span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"8782917379395917565\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; itemprop=\"reviews\" itemscope itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Review\">\n  <link itemprop=\"url\" href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/review/show/119044\" />\n    <a title=\"pinkgal\" class=\"left imgcol\" href=\"/user/show/7577-pinkgal\"><img alt=\"pinkgal\" src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/users/1232473322p2/7577.jpg\" /></a>\n\n  <div class=\"left bodycol\">\n    <div class=\"reviewHeader uitext name=\"pinkgal\" href=\"/user/show/7577-pinkgal\">pinkgal</a>\n\n        rated it\n        <span class=\" staticStars\"><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\">really liked it</span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"really liked it\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p0\"></span></span>\n\n          <span class=\"greyText\">U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0</span>\n          <a class=\"lightGreyText\" title=\"Hardcover 9780747573623\" href=\"/book/show/4256.Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban\">review of another edition</a>\n\n\n        \n\n\n          <div class=\"uitext greyText bookshelves\">\n            Shelves:\n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/7577-pinkgal?shelf=absolute-favorites\">absolute-favorites</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/7577-pinkgal?shelf=magic_fairytale-esque\">magic_fairytale-esque</a>\n          </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer119044\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer16309027124449587902\">It was September 1998; the third Harry Potter book had just been released. Pottermania? What's that? It was still unknown except to a vast population of younglings who'd read it... and I fell in love. Oh, how I fell in love. I fell in love with the poor, starved-for-affection, later known to be a twit Harry. I fell in love with the pretentious know-it-all Hermione. I fell in love with the awkward, grew-up-in-his-brother's-shadows Ron... and most of all? I fell in love with the snarky,</span>\n  <span id=\"freeText16309027124449587902\" style=\"display:none\">It was September 1998; the third Harry Potter book had just been released. Pottermania? What's that? It was still unknown except to a vast population of younglings who'd read it... and I fell in love. Oh, how I fell in love. I fell in love with the poor, starved-for-affection, later known to be a twit Harry. I fell in love with the pretentious know-it-all Hermione. I fell in love with the awkward, grew-up-in-his-brother's-shadows Ron... and most of all? I fell in love with the snarky, unplatable, snarling, rude, hygienically-disinclined professor of potions, Severus Snape. <br /><br />Almost ten years later, I'm still obsessed with it in many ways. <br /><br />I think this is my favorite of all the Harry Potter books thus far. This is the one that introduces Sirius Black, who I sometimes loathe (only sometimes!) and Remus Lupin, who I will always, always love. And of course, this is the book that gave us one piece of Severus Snape's background. And that was the infamous Prank that may or may not have destroyed Snape's trust in Dumbledore. Would you have trusted someone who didn't at least suspend the one who'd tried to kill you? I don't think so. This is also the book where I found myself looking at Dumbledore with a new eye. He's a crafty old fella, I tell you that. He'll do anything to gain his means, regardless of how he may personally feel on the matter. Grandpa Albus, he ain't. <br /><br />And Severus Snape, my heart did bleed for thee. </span>\n  <a data-text-id=\"16309027124449587902\" href=\"#\" onclick=\"swapContent($(this));; return false;\">...more</a>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n      <div class=\"reviewFooter uitext buttons\">\n          \n\n<tr class=\"no_border feedFooterReview\" \n\n<div id=\"review_388324122\" class=\"review\" itemprop=\"reviews\" itemscope itemtype=\"http://schema.org/Review\">\n  <link itemprop=\"url\" href=\"https://www.goodreads.com/review/show/388324122\" />\n    <a title=\"(9 3/4) Gerasimos\" class=\"left imgcol\" href=\"/user/show/11731184-9-3-4-gerasimos\"><img alt=\"(9 3/4) Gerasimos\" src=\"https://images.gr-assets.com/users/1449705496p2/11731184.jpg\" /></a>\n\n  <div class=\"left bodycol\">\n    <div class=\"reviewHeader uitext stacked\">\n        <a class=\"reviewDate createdAt right\" itemprop=\"publishDate\" href=\"/review/show/388324122?book_show_action=false\">Aug 07, 2016</a>\n\n      <a title=\"(9 3/4) Gerasimos\" class=\"user\" name=\"(9 3/4) Gerasimos\" href=\"/user/show/11731184-9-3-4-gerasimos\">(9 3/4) Gerasimos</a>\n\n        rated it\n        <span class=\" staticStars\"><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\">it was amazing</span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span><span title=\"it was amazing\" size=\"15x15\" class=\"staticStar p10\"></span></span>\n\n          <span class=\"greyText\">U+00A0 U+00B7 U+00A0</span>\n          <a class=\"lightGreyText\" title=\"Paperback 9780747549505\" href=\"/book/show/954838.Harry_Potter_and_the_Prisoner_of_Azkaban\">review of another edition</a>\n\n\n        \n\n\n          <div class=\"uitext greyText bookshelves\">\n            Shelves:\n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/11731184-9-3-4-gerasimos?shelf=own\">own</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/11731184-9-3-4-gerasimos?shelf=favourites\">favourites</a>, \n              <a class=\"actionLinkLite\" href=\"/review/list/11731184-9-3-4-gerasimos?shelf=reread\">reread</a>\n          </div>\n    </div>\n\n\n        <div class=\"reviewText stacked\">\n              <span id=\"reviewTextContainer388324122\" class=\"readable\"\n              >\n            \n<span id=\"freeTextContainer9510663161150153227\">Harry Potter changed my life. If I hadnU+2019t read Harry Potter when I did I would not be the same person today. What I am today, in a part is due to Harry. I cannot really say enough to make you understand how much Harry Potter means to me. </span>\n\n          </span>\n        </div>\n\n\n      <div class=\"reviewFooter uitext buttons\">\n
